paper_abstract: In this paper, the generalized inverse representations for the Laplacian block matrices of graphs G(1)boxed dot G(2) and G(1)boxed minus G(2) are proposed, based on which the explicit resistance distance can be obtained for the arbitrary two-vertex resistance in the electrical networks. Moreover, some numerical examples are presented, which show the correction and efficiency of the obtained results. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The resistance distances of electrical networks based on Laplacian generalized inverse
